mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NICK = #{updateNickname}, STACK = #{stack}, SLOGAN = #{slogan}, INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, SKILL = #{skill} WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTEST_TITLE, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG FROM CONTEST C JOIN CONTEST_ATTEND A ON C.CONTEST_NO = A.CONTEST_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE MEMBER_TYPE = 'C'
